title: Ep 348 | Uncle Si’s Tall Tales from the Duck Blind & How Christians Misapply the Rules of the Bible
description:
Jase talks about an outlandish story Si told in the duck blind. Phil and Jase discuss how to love your neighbor — especially when it's hard. Jase shares the story of a misguided church that disfellowshipped a woman who divorced her serial-killer husband, and the guys explain why extreme legalism isn't what God wanted. And Jase and Al break down why religious groups shouldn't become law enforcement agencies.
